::Prowl::

Prowl felt Nightstrike get behind him, and was flying up even before
the shots were fired. He slows down a bit and then dives, right above
Nightstrike, his talons slashing down to grab Nightstrike's back.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Nightstrike::
> 
> Nighstrike moved in that way that he was behind Prowl "Hey you 
> Maxidrone" cursed  Nighstrike "I wished play with the lizard girl
not 
> with you..."
> 
> He fired in Auroramode 25 expansive bullets against Prowl.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > ::Prowl::
> > 
> > Prowl flies further up, a missile passing under him and a few
shots
> > barely missing. He could feel IR's thoughts, and knew that she was
> > about to transform into her second beast mode, and probably make
him
> > do that too.
> > 
> > IR transformed, and Prowl's transformation was triggered as well,
> > though this was the first time that he'd been aware of it. His
mind
> > keeps full control as he turns into the 20-ft tall monster that
was
> > his second beast mode.
> > 
> > -You take the one on the ground,- he says to IR, -I'll take the
one 
> in
> > the air.-
> > 
> > Manuevering quickly, Prowl races after Nightstrike.
